learning_outcomes.description: Thesis submission - Consistently demonstrate the ability to work cooperatively, professionally, ethically and communicate effectively as part of a research team.
Thesis submission - Effectively communicate the results of the research in oral and written formats.
Thesis submission - Critically evaluate, transform and interpret information in the context of the existing knowledge base and translational implications of research findings.
Thesis submission - Demonstrate effective academic writing in the production of a research report suitable for publication in a peer-reviewed journal.

assessments.task_description: Students are expected to present their research formally in the format of a conference style oral presentation. More details can be found regarding detailed task description and assessment criteria on the Blackboard site for this course within the DClinDent Dentistry Research Guide 2026 document - 'Milestone 6'. The guide is available on the Blackboard course site>Learning Resources.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description:
Refer to the DClinDent Dentistry Research Guide 2026 document - 'Milestone 7'. The guide is available on the Blackboard course site>Learning Resources.

This milestone is set to ensure that the research report is satisfactory for submission for examination. You are to submit a research report that most closely resembles the version you plan to submit for examination (Milestone 8). The report must be formatted as per the thesis template.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Must be submitted via Blackboard (Turnitin) and copy e-mailed to course coordinator.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description:
Refer to the DClinDent Dentistry Research Guide 2026 document - 'Milestone 8'. The guide is available on the Blackboard course site>Learning Resources.

You should work closely with your Research Advisory Team and Discipline Lead to address all the issues raised by the assessor of your Milestone 7 research report, in order to finalise the research report for external examination.

To complete this milestone, you must submit the final version of the thesis to the Course Coordinator (via Turnitin on Blackboard and email copy) formatted as per the thesis template.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Must be submitted via Blackboard (Turnitin) and copy e-mailed to course coordinator.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

learning_activities.topic:
Writing a Thesis Report

To complete this milestone, you must submit the final version of the thesis to the Course Coordinator (via Turnitin on Blackboard and email copy) formatted as per the thesis template.
learning_activities.topic_description: Writing a Thesis Report To complete this milestone, you must submit the final version of the thesis to the Course Coordinator (via Turnitin on Blackboard and email copy) formatted as per the thesis template.

learning_activities.topic:
Conference style oral presentation

In this task, you will present your research for eight (8) minutes and two (2) minutes for the discussion in the format of an IADR conference style oral presentation.
learning_activities.topic_description: Conference style oral presentation In this task, you will present your research for eight (8) minutes and two (2) minutes for the discussion in the format of an IADR conference style oral presentation.
